version_description:
- Data shared to Apple's Health
- Portrait view with brand NEW layout
- New sessions and programs are only available on New Version
- Data log to track your health

- Pose library refined
- Bugs fixed and other minor improvements.
New features include: voice guide synced with videos and user interface refined. If you like our new update, please take a moment to review us. Your kind feedback really helps us become better.
New features include: voice guide synced with videos and user interface refined. If you like our new update, please take a moment to review us. Your kind feedback really helps us become better.

- Scheduled program synced across devices;
- A User-friendly COMMUNITY is released now!
In this new version, we offer high quality meditation tracks recorded by our spiritual experts to improve your sleep quality, and completely release your stress.
In this new version, you can check in everyday to reach your fitness goal and gain rewards. We also offer real-time Q&A, recipe, tips and workout recommendation for featured programs.

- Invite buddies from Facebook to get more fun.
- Ability to download & delete all workouts in programs.
- Separated control of volume of voice guide & BGM.
- Improvements on Community.

- Invite buddies from Facebook to get more fun.
- Ability to download & delete all workouts in programs.
- Separated control of volume of voice guide & BGM.
- Improvements on Community.

- Visitor mode support. Access to all classes without Login.
- Optimization for Community.

- Visitor mode support. Access to all classes without Login.
- Self-assessment for sign-up users. Program & class recommendations based on your level & goals.
- Optimization for Community.

- 30 Day Yoga Challenge online playing supported;
- Other bugs fixed.

1. Yoga Ability Test launched; find your own place in this world.
2. Private Q&A feature launched. Ask our professional coaches about your own questions.
3. Fundamental Videos published - there are so much you didn't know about yoga.
4. Become Daily Yoga's Official Coach and Community Star, and discover more possibilities.
5. Music function optimized.

1. Workshops of top coaches now open to Gold Pro Members with no time limits.
2. Silver Pros can directly upgrade to Gold Pro with price difference.
3. New Workshops added.
4. UI optimization.
5. Music function optimized.
Daily Yoga Audio Services released! Listen to mini mindfulness tracks and therapeutic music at any time, any place.
Daily Yoga Audio Services released! Listen to mini mindfulness tracks and therapeutic music at any time, any place.
Daily Yoga Audio Services released! Listen to mini mindfulness tracks and therapeutic music at any time, any place.
Brand new Check-In feature to inspire motivation! Keep checking in to earn points everyday.
Brand new Check-In feature to inspire motivation! Keep checking in to earn points everyday.

- Brand new Check-In feature to inspire motivation! Keep checking in to earn points everyday.
- iPhone X supported.

- Points renamed as Yo Coins. Unlock Pro Features in the Coin Center.
- Good topics deserve to be rewarded. Reward the topics that you like with your Coins in Community.
- Mirror Mode launched. Never Get Confused with Left and Right.

- Points renamed as Yo Coins. Unlock Pro Features in the Coin Center.
- Good topics deserve to be rewarded. Reward the topics that you like with your Coins in Community.
- Mirror Mode launched. Never Get Confused with Left and Right.
Now you can practice the first class for selected workshops and pro class plans. Go Pro before you try them out.
Now you can practice the first class for selected workshops and pro class plans. Go Pro before you try them out.
Now you can practice the first class for selected workshops and pro class plans. Go Pro before you try them out.

- Whole New Level System Launched. Practice yoga and exploit abundant rewards. 
- Decorate your own Personal Space and make yourself one of a kind.

New series 'Stress Relief' is launched. We offer programs & classes 'A Week's Bedtime Yoga', 'Expand Beyond All Stress', 'Total Body Healing', etc. for you to de-stress and totally relaxed.

Also, the new Audio Service is re-designed for listening to Yoga Knowledge, Mindfulness Session & Yoga Music at any time, any place. We worked with top coaches to offer valuable audio contents for who want to learn yoga and get improved.

New Workshops of Fertility, Prenatal and Postnatal are released, designed by top coaches.

5 series of Audio Service are launched. We offer Guided Meditation, Love & Happiness, Mantra, etc. to help de-stress, to offer calmness, to cure depression and to retain happiness at anytime.

Community improved. Friend suggestions based on your interests.

1. New Series of ‘Yoga with Props’ is released, containing yoga classes with yoga wheel, yoga strap, and yoga blocks.
2. Brand new User Interface which shines brighter with iOS 11 & iPhone X/ Material Design.
3. Apple Health feature optimized. Instantly sync your duration and calories to your Health App with no data missed.

New Series of ‘Yoga with Props’ is released, containing yoga classes with yoga wheel, yoga strap, and yoga blocks.

Brand new User Interface which shines brighter with iOS 11 & iPhone X.

Apple Health feature optimized. Instantly sync your duration and calories to your Health App with no data missed.

New Series of ‘Yoga with Props’ is released, containing yoga classes with yoga wheel, yoga strap, and yoga blocks.

Brand new User Interface which shines brighter with iOS 11 & iPhone X.

Apple Health feature optimized. Instantly sync your duration and calories to your Health App with no data missed.

- Conceiving & Fertility Boosting Program went online!  Nourish and prepare the womb for healthy conception. 
- 9 Day Full Body Sculpting Program launched. Improve your balance and your weight losing effect.

- Practice and Community Leaderboard launched, see your rankings and explore  more interesting insights. Now you can share your practice results in community after finishing a session. We've also optimized new users' guidance to help new yogis.

- Conceiving & Fertility Boosting Program went online! Nourish and prepare the womb for healthy conception. 
- 9 Day Full Body Sculpting Program launched. Improve your balance and your weight losing effect.
- Practice and Community Leaderboard launched, see your rankings and explore more interesting insights. Now you can share your practice results in community after finishing a session. We've also optimized new users' guidance to help new yogis.

- Conceiving & Fertility Boosting Program went online! Nourish and prepare the womb for healthy conception. 
- 9 Day Full Body Sculpting Program launched. Improve your balance and your weight losing effect.
- Practice and Community Leaderboard launched, see your rankings and explore more interesting insights. Now you can share your practice results in community after finishing a session. We've also optimized new users' guidance to help new yogis.

- “Yoga for Men Series” released, offering male-focused yoga programs & sessions for strength training and health improvement.
- Build your own team with the new ‘Grouping’ feature. Complete exercises with friends and share the prize afterwards.
- Invite your friends from Facebook and get points toward in-app contents.
- Bug fixed and improvements.

- Office Yoga Series Launched.  Altogether 6 sessions to refresh instantly and de-stress efficiently at your workplace and any place!
- Advanced Yoga Workshops Launched. A fun and simple way designed by Dashama Konah for everyone to understand and learn an advanced program.
- New feature - Challenge for Newbies is Launched. Finish all the tasks and earn Pro Member for FREE.
- Visual optimization.

- Office Yoga Series Launched. Altogether 6 sessions to refresh instantly and de-stress efficiently at your workplace and any place!
- Advanced Yoga Workshops Launched. A fun and simple way designed by Dashama Konah for everyone to understand and learn an advanced program.
- New feature - Challenge for Newbies is Launched. Finish all the tasks and earn Pro Member for FREE.
- Visual optimization.

- Yoga for a Sculpted Back and Core Strengthening Series launched. Train the core muscles and shape a defined back!
- Show difference before & after yoga practicing with the new collage feature.
- Search function optimized. Find the practice you want more easily.
- Shortcuts supported & Apple Watch function optimized. Start your exercise directly on your watch.

1. A brand new feature — Smart Coach added, with a 30-personalized workout plan to help you reach your goal.
2. More stable experience and performance improvements.
3. New Workshops have been updated.Now, start your workout!Daily Yoga

- Yoga for a Sculpted Back and Core Strengthening Series launched. Train the core muscles and shape a defined back!
- Show difference before & after yoga practicing with the new collage feature.
- Search function optimized. Find the practice you want more easily.
- Shortcuts supported & Apple Watch function optimized. Start your exercise directly on your watch.
- iOS 12 support implemented.

Yoga for 4 Day Neck Toning launched. Neck and shoulder pain can be relieved.
We offer substitutes for yoga props, which will no longer be a hindrance to practicing yoga. 
Show more key information of programs and sessions, easier to choose the more suitable one for you. 
You can see the dynamic change of practice data when finished yoga each time. 
Optimized the video display fits in different size of phones.

Yoga for 4 Day Neck Toning launched. Neck and shoulder pain can be relieved.
We offer substitutes for yoga props, which will no longer be a hindrance to practicing yoga. 
Show more key information of programs and sessions, easier to choose the more suitable one for you. 
You can see the dynamic change of practice data when finished yoga each time. 
Optimized the video display fits in different size of phones.

Accurately find your favorite videos by filter, including Level, Part, Focus, Duration and style.
Program calendar is provided - customize your own yoga plan.
Pro Service upgraded.

Accurately find your favorite videos by filter, including Level, Part, Focus, Duration and style.
Program calendar is provided - customize your own yoga plan.
Pro Service upgraded.

1.Tips section will be rolled out comprehensively, which helps you learn something about yoga daily. 
2.Grade after practicing, it’s helpful to optimize classes with your useful feedback.

Collection for Christmas is coming! We offer yoga plans for you to rest after a busy month and stay healthy with your families.

Yoga Tips section for you to eat healthy, ease into challenging poses and know yoga better.

Rate each class when you finish the workout. We will recommend the best class for you in 'Today' based on your ratings.

1.We add new explanations of yoga levels in each practice, which help you build a clear understanding of yoga and pratice step by step from beginner to advanced.
2.Audition for meditation has been released.
3.Data of offline practice will be uploaded when cellular netwrok connected.
4.More features and experience optimization.

1. Smart workouts recommendation released - Easily access workouts and plan based on your preferences and practice data.
2. Re-do the plan and enchance the results.

1. We upgrade the ""Poses"" function of Daily Yoga, which have access to view detailed explanations of 196 yoga poses including modifications for beginners, advanced variations and tips.  Besides, we make 27 videos explaining of yoga blocks.
2. Benefit : We offer a new tag ""free"", which supports to filter all free exercises of the app.
3. We add a new function in ""Me-Downloads Management"" where you can clean up all your downloaded files with one click.

New member center has been released.
You can check the following information in the member center:
1. Basic information of current members. Such as the level, type and service time of member.
2. Members purchase records. We support you to check the transaction or change records related to each member service from the new verison.
3. Tips for members. A more readable members guide lets you know how to protect your rights and interests.

New Series of 'Fat Burner for Beginners' is released, which contains every asanas fit for beginners to burn calories!

Relaxing Moment Added - After practice, you will enter a relaxing moment and choose your favorite music and relaxing duration to unwind.

Customized Calendar for Plans - You can arrange your class plans to make it more suitable for your schedule.

1. New class series for this summer is coming. We picked a set of popular classes for you to gain weight loss results.
2. Smart kit of '8 glasses of water ' reminder is released to help you build good habits.
3. Check out your successive practice and make records of your self.

1. A whole new design with a clearer Practice interface, where you can find your Favorites.

2. You can view your favorite and posted topics in the redesigned Topics page.

3. Added a Yoga Lab for you to manage some small functions.

1. The Categories function is more concise after the optimization.
2. You can retrieve the account that has subscribed to the Pro Membership through the Restore function.
3. Explore and Practice page with new icon.
4. You can close the pop-up notification for traffic alerts.
5. The background of some old workouts has been optimized.

1. A brand new feature — Smart Coach added, with a 30-personalized workout plan to help you reach your goal.
2. More stable experience and performance improvements.
3. New Workshops have been updated.Now, start your workout!Daily Yoga

1. This update includes new programs of ‘7 Day Knocked Knee Correction’ and sessions of ’Flat Feet Correction’, ‘Hip Dips Fixing’ for yogis to get toned and straight legs.
2. More yoga tips and challenges for all levels to help you get into a healthy life. 
3. Fixed some bugs.

1. We will recommend more accurate programs based on your interests in the Popular Collections on the Explore page. 
2. When jumping from a post in Community to a Program details page, the situation where the language version is missing has been optimized. 
3. You can give feedback on the reason you discard the exercise.  
4. The translation of the multi-language settings page has been optimized.

1. The Target Zone added, where you can better plan your yoga workout.
2. You can filter by courses completion satus with filter function, which will be more convenient to choose programs or seesions.

1. Push mechanism optimization: you'll receive only one practice reminder daily and repeated weekly, which can be added to the calendar.
2. The Chinese version of Fundamental Videos is available.
3. You can sign in with Apple and manage your account in“Ways of Sign in".
4. Support Dark Mode in app.

1.We have some updates in the Program detail page, now from here, you can see your progress, download all sessions in advance, get related recommendations, and best of all, you can preview all sessions' details.
2. You can preview related props, fundamental videos and poses of all sessions included in the Program.
3. The Target is updated, you can find it again in the EXPORE tab.

We've listened to the feedback from the Daily Yoga Community, and we've updated the app to give you a better yoga journey.

Exciting Updates:

•Smart Couch feature on the Daily Yoga app is becoming more various, giving you three new goals to choose: Beginner Essentials; Stress Relief; Muscle Tone.

•Preview before practicing, and can be shared after finishing the exercises in Smart Coach.

•For those on iOS 13, it is now compatible to sign in Daily Yoga using the Apple ID that you already have.

•Personal data from various devices can be tracked in App. Hope you enjoy and happy tracking.

•The 8-glasses plan is updated and can be closed manually in the English version.

•Everyone can share the sessions after practicing to the Community.

As always, if you run into any troubles, please contact support@dailyyoga.com

Thanks for using Daily Yoga! 
There’re some updates:
1. HDR Apple TV experience! Accompanied by soothing background music, you can enjoy terrific yoga experience by connecting to Apple TV. It will be easier to follow teachers on the big screen. 
2. New programs are upcoming! There’re 500+ asanas, 70+ yoga class plans, 500+ guided yoga, pilates, meditation classes available in the App.
3. The Pose Library is accessible to all Pro members. Go to look through the various yoga poses and blocks there.We can be there to support you during every moment of your health journey!

1. There’re two modes to set up the program: recommended mode and custom mode that allows to schedule the program bases on preference.  
2. The new release includes performance enhancements and bug fixes.

1. The Smart Coach feature has been improved, users can get a more specific customed workout plan based on their level and target. 
2. The new program Flat Abs Challenge for Beginners has been launched.
3. The calorie calculating way has been improved, which can calculate more accurately.
4. The sign-up ways have been improved.

1. Fixed some known issues.
2. Added some courses.
3. Redesigned some interfaces.

Thanks for using Daily Yoga. New classes uploaded! 

Solfeggio Meditations is a series of six meditation recordings teaching by Glenn Harrold in English. You will have the potential to release deep-rooted blockages and negative patterns of behavior with it.

Plus:
- History page added. Viewing the past practice history and jump to the program or session details page directly.
- Statistics page added. Viewing related statistics by week,
month, and year dimensions here.

Enjoy your daily yoga journey!

1. Users can make records about their feelings and experience after the practice.
2. After-practicing sharing content can include personal practice data.
3. Users can jump to the corresponding program or session detail page from the practice data page directly.
4. Users can add their experience on the program detail page.

Welcome to Daily Yoga! We made a big change in this version.
Hope to provide a better experience possible for browsing, discovering and practicing yoga program:
1. The Explore tab changes to the Course tab and the My Practice tab changes to the Home tab. It is much easier to find courses.
2. Add the Editor Choice and All category areas on the Course page, Plus the sorting function.
3. The Fundamentals, Audios, Poses, and Target move to the Profile page.
4. We’re here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for You.
5. To provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone.
To stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!
Stay safe, Namaste!

Welcome to Daily Yoga! We made a big change in this version.
Hope to provide a better experience possible for browsing, discovering and practicing yoga program:
1. The Explore tab changes to the Course tab and the My Practice tab changes to the Home tab. It is much easier to find courses.
2. Add the Editor Choice and All category areas on the Course page, Plus the sorting function.
3. The Fundamentals, Audios, Poses, and Target move to the Profile page.
4. We’re here for you! Daily Yoga opens a Free Collection for You.
5. To provide 6 programs and 13 sessions free to everyone.
To stay safe and keep positive during the uncertain time!
Stay safe, Namaste!

1. Big updates in Search feature: 
 * You can use the keywords to search for all related programs, sessions, poses,  fundamental videos, topics and users.
 * Add two filter types: by popular and newest. 2. Optimize the programs' preview page, and add the poses preview videos.
3. Support to use more emoji to write a comment. 
4. Add the user ID setting into the profile page for the convenience of support communications.

1. Big updates in Search feature: 
 * You can use the keywords to search for all related programs, sessions, poses,  fundamental videos, topics and users.
 * Add two filter types: by popular and newest. 
2. Optimize the programs' preview page, and add the poses preview videos.
3. Support to use more emoji to write a comment. 
4. Add the user ID setting into the profile page for the convenience of support communications.

1. To help you login quicker and easier, the last logged-in account will be shown at sign-in.
2. Directly access favorite sessions from a program.    
3. Get access to sessions within a program by searching or filtering directly.
4. Opitimized background music to give you a better practice experience.
5. Mark limited-time free sessions with TRIAL icon.
Thank you for using Daily Yoga app! Included in this release are bug fixes and improvements.
Thank you for using Daily Yoga app! Included in this release are bug fixes and improvements.

1. The Smart Coach has been updated. You can set the frequency and duration now.
2. One Gold Pro update: Smart Coach is exclusive for Good Pro. 
3. Add the full screen mode to provide a better experience.
4. Photos taken by Daily Yogis are added into practice-share pics.

1. The Smart Coach has been updated, and now it's supportive for users to set its frequency and duration personally.
2. The Gold Pro update: Smart Coach is exclusive for Gold Pro membership. 
3. The Meditation Category expands A LOT. More options, more convenience!
4. Thank you for choosing the Daily Yoga app! The new release includes fixed bugs and function improvements. Have fun with Daily Yoga!

Happy DY's 8th Anniversary! Come and join the Birthday Puzzle Challenge.
1. Upcoming courses in August: Yoga Basics for Beginners I, Full Body Pilates Fat Burn and Ashtanga Strength Building.
2. The Smart Coach has been updated, and now it's supportive for users to set its frequency and duration personally.
3. The Meditation Category expands A LOT. More options, more convenience!
Thank you for choosing the Daily Yoga app!

The SCHEDULE is coming!  Organize and plan your practices faster and easier, follow daily for optimum results!

1. The new look of course selection will help you find courses more conveniently and quickly.

1. New in September: 6 Day Beginner Flexibility, Ashtanga Second Series, Flabby Arms Fat Burner, Beautiful Chest Builder, and Whole Body Fat Burner.
2. The new practice record sharing function will be launched soon. Share and record your yoga practice with more friends. History exercises can also be shared again.
3. The most popular challenge is underway, HIIT Yoga Cardio Fusion Challenge & Immunity Boosting Challenge.
4. SmartCoach is available to modify the schedule of workout days and rest days. The schedule allows you to modify the date that you practice.

As always, if you run into any troubles, let us know at support@dailyyoga.com
